title: Conduct a Pre-Flight Safety Briefing
description: Before every flight, the cabin crew must conduct a safety briefing for passengers.

tasks.description: Make an announcement to direct passengers' attention to the briefing.
Demonstrate the use of safety equipment, including seatbelts, oxygen masks, and life vests.
Point out the emergency exits and ensure the exit rows are clear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Crew completes the briefing and performs a final cabin check.
